name: Match 2!
description:
Some games have you match 3... We just want you to match 2!

Guaranteed to be the most frantic puzzle game you've ever played!

- Clear the board of all available matches to have the next one drop down.
- Make as many matches as you can before time expires!
- Earn squares to buy powerups & unlock new themes.
- Compare scores with friends.
- Earn free rewards by inviting your friends to play!

Have fun!
